snippet.title: Alexandria IV - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Tasked with commanding of one of the most challenging sectors of the galaxy, the future of the Alexandria IV space station depends on your diplomatic and strategic capabilities. How far will you go to prevent a war? A space opera visual novel by J.M. Beraldo.

#timegalleon #visualnovel #indiegames #freedemo #alexandriaIV #scifi
